title: Rainy night driving on a city street with moderate speed and 3 braking events.

context: This clip is from ego vehicle index 2 in the CARLA simulation. Weather is rainy (hardRainNight). The ego vehicle is driving at a moderate speed (average speed â‰ˆ 6.3 m/s). There are 3 braking events or strong decelerations in this window.

reasoning: The ego vehicle is driving at a moderate speed because of the rainy weather conditions. The driver is being cautious and following the other cars to avoid any potential accidents. The 3 braking events could be due to the slippery road surface caused by the rain. The driver is maintaining a safe distance from the other vehicles on the road to prevent any collisions.
